# CheckColumns

## ColumnInvalidType

<!-- Description, Properties, ... sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- REPLACE ME AUTO-GENERATION -->

### Details

A column should be of Param/Type 'read', 'write', 'group', 'read bit' or 'write bit'.
